Title: Authorizes the village of Trumansburg to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to a certain formerly employed police officer
Summary: Authorizes the village of Trumansburg to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Daniel H. Austic under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Daniel H. Austic to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
